thread.title: Meet The New Lipstick That’s Been Low-Key Dominating Pinterest
thread.title_full: Meet The New Lipstick That’s Been Low-Key Dominating Pinterest

author: Jessica Ourisman
title: Meet The New Lipstick That’s Been Low-Key Dominating Pinterest
text:
Jessica Ourisman Mar 18, 2017 
ICYMI, there’s a new, long-lasting lipstick in town that’s got all of Pinterest doing major heart-eyes. Jouer Cosmetics , the makers of the rose gold lip color that sent beauty vloggers into a frenzy, has busted out yet another glorious hue to keep your pucker poppin’ this spring . This time it’s Papaye, the peachy-metallic color-of-the-moment that’s already been pinned nearly 200k times . Take a look at makeup’s new lip color that’s well on its way to making Lip Kits yesterday’s news. 
Papaye ($18) gives you the VIP treatment with all the hints of pink and metallic shimmer that a pout could want. It’s no wonder the color is selling out faster than we can type “#trending.” 
The unique, peachy undertones, paired with the glitz of Jouer Cosmetics’ Long-Wear Lip Topper ($16), are a match made in #MOTD heaven. Oh, and did we mention that this shade comes in a creamy, super-smooth liquid lipstick? That means it not only feels ah-mazing on, but it’s lightweight and a cinch to apply. 
Do you think Jouer Cosmetics could have just stolen King Kylie’s throne? Tell us on Pinterest ! 
(Featured photo via @lipstickkitty /Instagram)
